abstract: Wouter P.F. Schmit Jongbloed, Lisa E. Sachs and Karl P. Sauvant, "Sovereign Investment: An Introduction, in Karl P. Sauvant, Lisa Sachs and Wouter Schmit-Jongbloed, eds., Sovereign Investment: Concerns and Policy Reactions (New York: Oxford University Press, 2012), pp. 3-23.
title: Sovereign Investment: An Introduction
subject: law
